parameters.name: InputObject
parameters.description: Pointer to the Dispatch object in a part or assembly (see Remarks )

title: IView.GetCorresponding
description: Gets the object in this drawing view that corresponds to the specified part or assembly object.

parameters.name: InputObject
parameters.description: Pointer to the Dispatch object in a part or assembly (see Remarks )

returns: Pointer to the corresponding object in this drawing view; null or Nothing if none found
remarks:
InputObject can be any object assigned a persistent reference or object ID; for example,
IAnnotation
,
IFeature
,
ISketch
,
ISketchSegment
, etc.
Annotation objects will be found only if they were previously imported into this drawing view.
Use
IModelDocExtension::GetCorresponding2
to get the part or assembly object that corresponds to an object in a drawing view.
